database.name: VIEW SSFI_PAYMENT_CREDIT_V
database.view: SELECT fpc.fin_payment_id AS origen_payment_id, fpo.paymentdate AS fecha_origen, fpc.fin_payment_id_used AS credit_payment_id, fp.documentno AS documento_cruce, fp.c_bpartner_id, fp.referenceno AS referencia, fp.paymentdate AS fecha_cp, fp.paymentdate AS fecha_contable, fp.isreceipt AS tipo_transaccion, abs(fpc.amount) AS pago_cobro, fp.c_costcenter_id AS costcenter_id, fp.status AS estado FROM fin_payment_credit fpc JOIN fin_payment fp ON fp.fin_payment_id = fpc.fin_payment_id_used JOIN fin_payment_detail fpd ON fpd.fin_payment_id = fpc.fin_payment_id_used JOIN fin_payment fpo ON fpo.fin_payment_id = fpc.fin_payment_id GROUP BY fpc.fin_payment_id, fpo.paymentdate, fpc.fin_payment_id_used, fp.documentno, fp.c_bpartner_id, fp.referenceno, fp.paymentdate, fp.isreceipt, abs(fpc.amount), fp.c_costcenter_id, fp.status ORDER BY fpc.fin_payment_id
